comments.body:
nit: this could be (for consistency)

```scala
private val regex = """.*needs to be abstract.*""".r
def unapply(d: l.Diagnostic): Option[String] = d.getMessage() match {
  case regex() => Some(d.getMessage())
  case _ => None
}
```

done https://github.com/scalameta/metals/pull/1379/commits/15d8e1feba9aed6cce18d9f6b74382f464b8be1e ðŸ‘ 

Added `(?s)` to enable `.` to capture newline characters (because the diagnostic usually have multiple lines).
https://docs.oracle.com/javase/8/docs/api/java/util/regex/Pattern.html#DOTALL
